name: Halloween House Party
description:
Halloween House Party is a visual novel created for Spooktober 2nd Annual Visual Novel Jam.  You play as Cordelia, an awkward college recluse dragged to her first college party by her best friend and roommate, Ashe.  Spend your time chatting up party goers, mixing drinks, and… flirting?

Find love in this fun, spooky, sapphic visual novel!  Will you be swept off your feet, or will you end up getting ghosted?

~18,000 word count!
3 dateable characters!
Good and neutral endings!
Drink mixing mini-game!
